storyboards.caption: Sam realizes he would like some hot tea. He has tea, but not hot water.
storyboards.alt: cartoon of sam a sloth wanting hot water

storyboards.caption: He goes to the CIT kitchen and realizes there's a new water dispenser. He pauses to see how to use it.
storyboards.alt: cartoon of sam figuring out the new machine

storyboards.caption: He realizes someone wrote a long set of instructions on how to use the water dispenser.
storyboards.alt: cartoon of instructions to use water dispense

storyboards.caption: Sam places the cup first under the dispenser. He places it so that it fits the center where the water may dispense from.
storyboards.alt: cartoon of sam placing cup under the water dispenser

storyboards.caption: Sam realizes he actually needs hot water and quickly adjust his arm to the left to hover over the red sensor.
storyboards.alt: cartoon of sam changing arms location for hot water

storyboards.caption: Sam realizes he actually needs hot water and quickly adjust his arm to the left to hover over the red sensor.
storyboards.alt: cartoon of sam raising right hand to hover
cartoon of sam feeling like Darth Vader
storyboards.caption: Sam is amused to obtain not water by hovering his hand, instead of pressing a button. He feels like Darth Vader.

storyboards.alt: cartoon of sam feeling pain in right arm
storyboards.caption: After some time, Sam winces, because he has a bad arm. His years of sitting at his desk coding has created acute shoulder pain from carpal tunnel.
So Sam switches arms, and uses his left arm to continue obtaining water.

storyboards.alt: cartoon of sam being happy wiht hot tea
storyboards.caption: Sam is content because now he has hot tea in a germ-free manner.
